revised_title: Excitation of the 3p-Subshell in Chromium Vapour: A Study of Atomic Absorption Spectrum
tldr: The authors studied the atomic absorption spectrum of chromium vapour in the region of 3p-subshell excitation. They observed a strong discrete spectrum and compared it with Hartree-Fock calculations to establish the energy of the absorption thresholds. The results provide insights into the differences between atomic and metallic spectra of chromium and help interpret the observed features.
